channel.title: Adding new island
channel.description: well i tried adding a new island deeper in the wilderness where water usually is, the landscape added fine but cant move at all when i go to it like im still on water, any ideas why?

item.title: Adding new island
item.dc:creator: @Fabrice_L Fabrice L
item.description:
@Fabrice_L wrote:

[quote=“waj, post:9, topic:529006”][quote author=matty matt link=topic=647759.msg4356611#msg4356611 date=1377785667]

well i tried adding a new island deeper in the wilderness where water usually is, the landscape added fine but cant move at all when i go to it like im still on water, any ideas why?

i believe if you do this it will work. You gotta First delete all the water tiles with a tile remover, and then re add regular ground tiles and you will be able to walk on the ground.
[/quote]
I swear your posts get more retarded every time you post.[/quote]

^^

Read full topic

item.title: Adding new island
item.dc:creator: @waj waj
item.description:
@waj wrote:

[quote=“matty matt, post:7, topic:529006”][quote author=-So Kurupt- link=topic=647759.msg4356593#msg4356593 date=1377780386]
well i tried adding a new island deeper in the wilderness where water usually is, the landscape added fine but cant move at all when i go to it like im still on water, any ideas why?
[/quote]
i believe if you do this it will work. You gotta First delete all the water tiles with a tile remover, and then re add regular ground tiles and you will be able to walk on the ground.[/quote]
I swear your posts get more retarded every time you post.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding new island
item.dc:creator: @imthenull imthenull
item.description:
@imthenull wrote:

[quote=“waj, post:6, topic:529006”][quote author=Lothy link=topic=647759.msg4356608#msg4356608 date=1377783895]
It sounds like you aren’t setting the bitfield properly on the TileValue objects that represent those tiles. This means that you can’t walk to/from the tile in question.
[/quote]
It just sounds like the client/server landscapes don’t match.[/quote]That’s what he means.

[quote=“matty matt, post:7, topic:529006”][quote author=-So Kurupt- link=topic=647759.msg4356593#msg4356593 date=1377780386]
well i tried adding a new island deeper in the wilderness where water usually is, the landscape added fine but cant move at all when i go to it like im still on water, any ideas why?
[/quote]
i believe if you do this it will work. You gotta First delete all the water tiles with a tile remover, and then re add regular ground tiles and you will be able to walk on the ground.[/quote]No… just no.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding new island
item.dc:creator: @matty_matt matty matt
item.description:
@matty_matt wrote:

-So Kurupt-:

well i tried adding a new island deeper in the wilderness where water usually is, the landscape added fine but cant move at all when i go to it like im still on water, any ideas why?

i believe if you do this it will work. You gotta First delete all the water tiles with a tile remover, and then re add regular ground tiles and you will be able to walk on the ground.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding new island
item.dc:creator: @waj waj
item.description:
@waj wrote:

Lothy:

It sounds like you aren’t setting the bitfield properly on the TileValue objects that represent those tiles. This means that you can’t walk to/from the tile in question.

It just sounds like the client/server landscapes don’t match.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding new island
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

It sounds like you aren’t setting the bitfield properly on the TileValue objects that represent those tiles. This means that you can’t walk to/from the tile in question.

Read full topic
